channel.title: 一桃三士 补给站
channel.description: Recent content on 一桃三士 补给站

item.title: About
item.description:
Hugo is a static site engine written in Go.

It makes use of a variety of open source projects including:

  • Cobra
  • Viper
  • J Walter Weatherman
  • Cast

Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

item.title: 第一篇博客谈谈起床的计划
item.description: 春寒料峭，再加上“清明时节雨纷纷”。这一段不断的阴雨天气，让起床越来越困难了。但是早晨又是阅读的最好时机，早晨的阅读，理解力和文字在头脑中的清晰感都特别的强。所以自己更应该好好的利用这段时间，早点起床，复习昨天学习的内容，看看书。 今年想考一下法学考试。所以买了指南针的法考的书，打算好好的看看。所以给自己定了早上5点起床看书的计划。起床的时候，先把昨天看的内容复习一下，然后开始看新内容。 法考真的不能先看理论法和宪法的内容。看了我就没什么动力，里面充满了中国特色，因为大学看了很多古希腊哲学家和西方的经典著作，对我国的特色人民民主专政有点难以消化，所以先看这部分内容的话会有点抵触心理。 还有一个问题就是，看完了一本书，做题的时候发现很多细细的知识点需要把握，如果不练习做题的话，看书的用处不大。所以看完的科目，每天都要固定的做题来当作复习，以查缺补漏。 从小到大考试都是靠实力，从来没相信过运气。所以要努力吧。

item.title: Jane-Theme Footnote Preview
item.description:
Hugo-theme-jane optimized for footnote. When you mouse hover the footnote1 , footnote content will be displayed.

Footnote-1

You can create footnotes like this[^footnote].

[^footnote]: Here is the *text* of the **footnote**.

will produce:

You can create footnotes like this2.

Mouse on the ‘footnote’ superscript to see content of the footnote.

Footnote-2

You can create footnotes like this[^footnote2].

[^footnote2]: Here is the *text* of the **footnote**.

will produce:

You can create footnotes like this3.

Mouse on the ‘footnote’ superscript to see content of the footnote.

Footnote-3

You can create footnotes like this[^footnote].

[^footnote]: Here is the *text* of the **footnote**.

will produce:

You can create footnotes like this4.

Mouse on the ‘footnote’ superscript to see content of the footnote.

Footnote-4

You can create footnotes like this[^footnote].

[^footnote]: Here is the *text* of the **footnote**.

will produce:

You can create footnotes like this5.

Mouse on the ‘footnote’ superscript to see content of the footnote.

Footnote-5

You can create footnotes like this[^footnote].

[^footnote]: Here is the *text* of the **footnote**.

will produce dddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddd:

You can create footnotes like this6.

Mouse on the ‘footnote’ superscript to see content of the footnote.

  1. example footnote show. [return]
  2. Here is the text of the footnote-1. [return]
  3. Here is the text of the footnote-2. Here is the text of the footnote-2. Here is the text of the footnote-2. Here is the text of the footnote-2. Here is the text of the footnote-2. The world’s fastest framework for building websites | Hugo [return]
  4. Here is the text of the footnote-3. [return]
  5. Here is the text of the footnote-4. [return]
  6. Here is the text of the footnote-5. [return]
